articles.author: Aimee Picchi
articles.title: Federal Reserve pauses interest rate hikes — for now - CBS News
articles.description: The central bank is leaving interest rates unchanged after 11 hikes since March 2022, which has boosted borrowing costs for millions of Americans.
articles.content:
The Federal Reserve is pausing its extended campaign against inflation, holding its benchmark interest rate steady and giving borrowers a breather after 11 hikes since March 2022.
